SELECT A.MEM_ID MEMID ,A.MEM_EMAIL MEMEMAIL ,A.MEM_POINT MEMPOINT ,NVL(B.P_REPORT_COUNT,0) PREPORTCOUNT ,NVL(C.R_REPORT_COUNT,0) RREPORTCOUNT ,A.MEM_NICKNAME MEMNICKNAME ,A.MEM_DELETE MEMDELETE
FROM MEMBER A
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MEM_ID ,COUNT(*) P_REPORT_COUNT FROM POST A, P_REPORT B WHERE A.POST_NO=B.POST_NO GROUP BY MEM_ID) B ON (A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MEM_ID ,COUNT(*) R_REPORT_COUNT FROM POST A, P_REPORT B WHERE A.POST_NO=B.POST_NO GROUP BY MEM_ID) C ON (A.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID)
WHERE MEM_ADMIN = 'N'
ORDER BY 3 DESC
